source.name: Q12
source.instructions:
From [official k8s HPA docs](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/run-application/horizontal-pod-autoscale/#support-for-resource-metrics): 

> Since the resource usages of all the containers are summed up the total pod utilization may not accurately represent the individual container resource usage.
> This could lead to situations where a single container might be running with high usage and the HPA will not scale out because the overall pod usage is still within acceptable limits.

How could that issue be addressed efficiently?

answers.answer: Reduce the resource limits of the other containers.
Set the resources requests to be equal to limits.
Split the containers to different Pods.
